title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING THE TRANSPLANTING OF PADDY SEEDLINGS ?
records.KccAns: THE TRANSPLANTING OF PADDY SEEDLINGS IS ON AND AFTER 20TH JUNE .
Apply - cartap hydrochloride 4 G @ 10kg /acre

records.QueryText: Regarding Spray of Paushak in Apple trees?
records.KccAns: Spray Paushak @2ml in 1 litre of water at Walnut size stage

records.QueryText: Information regarding may june recommendation of spray schedule in mango ?
records.KccAns: Spray imidacloprid @ 0.5 ml per liter of water, After that spray blitox @ 600 gram per 200 liter of water.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING THE CONTROL WHITE FLY IN SUGARCANE ?
records.KccAns: SPRAY COFIDOR 17.8SL @ 40ML IN 150 LITRES OF WATER / ACRE .

records.QueryText:
information regarding fertilizer dose in paddy

Information regarding how to control Iron Deficiency in Paddy nursery?
records.KccAns:
1. Total fertilizers dose in Paddy:- 110 Kg. Urea, 27 Kg. DAP and 20 Kg. Potash per acre. Skip phosphorus application if recommended dose of phosphorus had been applied to the preceeding wheat crop.
2. 
To control Iron Deficiency in paddy nursery spray 5 gm. Ferrous Sulphate in per litre of water.
SPRAY THIAMETHOXAM @ 7 GM / 15 LITER OF WATER FOR CHECKING WHITE FLY IN BRINJAL.

records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about disease management of buffalo?
records.KccAns: recommended for to know information about disease management of buffalo  contact to your animal hospital/veterinary doctor or contact 1962,0755 2772262

records.QueryText: Farmer wants s to know information about collection of soil sample for soil testing?
records.KccAns: Recommended for Aside from DIB hole clean from top to bottom 2 cm Thick clay clean bucket or tray and put in the bottom to take out. collected the soil by hand, mix thoroughly and put on clean clothes pile, make a goal. Different finger to remove dirt from the pile of four equal parts. Now the remaining two parts of the soil again to mix well and set goals. This process is then repeated until almost half forts Top soil remains. The representative samples.
